        Starter method add. pre: The object to insert must implement the Comparable interface.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        add in class BinarySearchTree<E>
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • delete

        public E delete(E target)
        Starter method delete. post: The object is not in the tree.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface SearchTree<E>
        Overrides:
        delete in class BinarySearchTree<E>
        Parameters:
        target - The object to be deleted
        Returns:
        The object deleted from the tree or null if the object was not in the tree
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if target does not implement Comparable
